heading: Applications for certificates of occupancy
text:
All applications for certificates of occupancy shall be submitted on forms
furnished by the department. Applications for new buildings or additions to buildings shall be accompanied by an accurate and
complete final lot survey made by a land surveyor showing such information as prescribed by the commissioner. The commissione r
may waive the requirement of such survey in the case of small sheds, stands, temporary structures, signs, and similar small structures.
